item.title: 参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）提出了一项法案，希望将美国的工作周缩短至32小时，同时不损失工人的工资：
item.description:
Sen. Bernie Sanders has introduced a bill to reduce the workweek to 32 hours in the U.S. with no loss of pay for workers.

More: https://t.co/9BwvRDRJJ6 pic.twitter.com/T10ZQumExR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 下面列出了一些关于 TikTok 的普遍但虚假的说法，以及真相究竟在哪里：
item.description:
Here's a list of prevalent but false claims about TikTok — and where the truth actually lies: https://t.co/SZNqj7hiiu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 研究人员确认了据信是世界上已知最古老的口红--一个装有深红色膏状物的华丽小石瓶。这件罕见的文物是在伊朗东南部发现的。
item.description:
Researchers have identified what is believed to be the world's oldest known lipstick – a small, ornate stone vial containing a deep red paste.

The rare artifact was discovered in southeastern Iran. https://t.co/AyWIAG25S5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）透露自己正在与乳腺癌作斗争，这使一种用于帮助确定个人患病风险的工具备受关注。
item.description:
Olivia Munn's revelation that she is battling breast cancer put an important spotlight on a tool used to help determine a person's risk of the disease. https://t.co/vgMqmvNvcX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 纽约市一名 32 岁的男子在地铁上开枪，造成一人重伤，检察官以 "自卫 "为由，没有对这名男子提出任何指控：
item.description:
No charges are being filed against the 32-year-old man who fired a gun on a New York City subway, critically injuring one person, prosecutors said, citing "self-defense."

Read more: https://t.co/21qoPu5Qld pic.twitter.com/Y0ZDU1O23Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 根据一份尸检报告，科罗拉多州一名男子在被宠物吉拉怪咬伤后被置于生命维持系统中，死于沙漠蜥蜴毒液引起的并发症。
item.description:
A Colorado man who was placed on life support after he was bitten by his pet Gila monster died of complications from the desert lizard's venom, according to an autopsy report. https://t.co/cWiWnSVN8W

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 百思买周四宣布召回其内部品牌 Insignia 的空气炸锅和空气炸炉。
item.description:
Best Buy announced Thursday it is recalling air fryers and air fryer ovens from its in-house Insignia brand. https://t.co/3Po6c30YsP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 狗拉雪橇运动已经从一种曾经在白雪皑皑地区非常重要的运输方式，转变为一种纪念北方历史的大众化越野娱乐活动。但气候变化正迫使艾迪塔罗德雪橇赛做出调整。
item.description:
Dogsledding has transitioned from a once-vital form of transportation in snow-covered regions to a popularized cross-country recreation that commemorates the history of the North.

But climate change is forcing the Iditarod to adapt. https://t.co/y881f2zyN5 pic.twitter.com/egZNf5k59W

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 司法部宣布，蒙大拿州一名男子承认在 "大胆计划 "中对巨型杂交绵羊进行基因工程改造并将其出售给狩猎机构。
item.description:
Montana man pleads guilty to genetically engineering giant hybrid sheep in "audacious scheme" to sell the species to hunting facilities, DOJ announces. https://t.co/JjxSCNzrdU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 一个强大的房地产贸易集团已同意取消数十年来帮助确定经纪人佣金的政策，以解决声称这些规则迫使人们支付人为抬高的卖房成本的诉讼。
item.description:
A powerful real estate trade group has agreed to do away with policies that for decades helped set agent commissions, moving to resolve lawsuits that claim the rules have forced people to pay artificially inflated costs to sell their homes. https://t.co/fu1kZcUl57

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: "你们为我和我的家人所做的一切真的很了不起"。前 UFC 冠军马克-科尔曼（Mark Coleman）在医院康复期间对自己还活着感到 "幸运和感激"，几天前他的家人说他曾帮助父母从俄亥俄州家中的火灾中获救。
item.description:
"What you have done for me and my family is truly remarkable." Former UFC champion Mark Coleman is "blessed and grateful" to be alive while recovering in the hospital, days after his family said he helped rescue his parents from a fire at their Ohio home. https://t.co/CNtDakW76b pic.twitter.com/nXzPHWdFSV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 随着春季购房季的到来，越来越多急于出售房屋的房主降低了最初要价，以吸引潜在买家。
item.description:
More homeowners eager to sell their house are lowering their initial asking price in a bid to entice prospective buyers as the spring homebuying season gets going. https://t.co/jbOL160ISq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部宣布，一名佛罗里达州男子因在哈马斯 10 月 7 日袭击以色列两周后给纽约市世界犹太人大会留下威胁性语音邮件而被判处六个月监禁。
item.description:
A Florida man was sentenced to six months in prison for leaving a threatening voicemail with the World Jewish Congress in New York City two weeks after Hamas' Oct. 7 attack on Israel, the Justice Department announced. https://t.co/S6wFJR4k3e

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 前 UFC 冠军马克-科尔曼（Mark Coleman）在医院康复期间表示，他对自己还活着感到 "幸运和感激"，几天前他的家人说他曾帮助父母从俄亥俄州家中的火灾中获救。
item.description:
Former UFC champion Mark Coleman said he's "blessed and grateful" to be alive while recovering in the hospital, days after his family said he helped rescue his parents from a fire at their Ohio home. https://t.co/h1vRUmY50N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的葬礼结束后的几天里，成千上万的人继续在莫斯科南部的公墓外排队，等待向他的墓地献花。
item.description:
For days after the funeral of the Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, thousands of people continued to line up outside the cemetery in southern Moscow waiting to lay flowers at his grave. https://t.co/y5qS6zdl3n

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 众议员劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）在争取继续担任国会议员的过程中走着最狭窄的钢丝绳，但她的竞选团队警告说，现在还不能将她排除在外。
item.description:
Rep. Lauren Boebert is walking the narrowest of tightropes as she campaigns to remain in Congress — but operatives warn against writing her off just yet. https://t.co/x6FCebbEml

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 特朗普白宫前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）向美国最高法院提出紧急上诉，试图在努力推翻两项藐视国会的定罪的同时，继续留在监狱外。
item.description:
Former Trump White House adviser Peter Navarro filed an emergency appeal to the U.S. Supreme Court in an attempt to remain out of prison as he works to overturn his conviction on two counts of contempt of Congress. https://t.co/2MdTCWrf4V

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 卡拉-迪瓦伊（Cara Delevingne）在加利福尼亚州工作室城的家一夜之间被烧毁，她悲痛欲绝。
item.description:
Cara Delevingne is devastated after her Studio City, California, home burned down overnight.

The cause of the fire is currently under investigation. https://t.co/ifTUIkX30k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 据洛根县官员称，周四晚间暴风雨和龙卷风席卷中西部和南部地区，俄亥俄州莱克维尤有三人死亡。
item.description:
Three people are dead in Lakeview, Ohio, after storms and tornadoes ripped through the Midwest and the South Thursday night, according to Logan County officials. https://t.co/Wr1hgHsk4E

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: "他们做着普通的事情......却碰巧与连环杀手擦肩而过"。从悬案到关联案件连环杀手与五起袭击案有关
item.description:
"They were doing ordinary things ... and they just happened to cross the path of a serial killer."

From cold cases to connected: Serial predator linked to five attacks. https://t.co/uwKPE5yVaO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前副总统迈克-彭斯（Mike Pence）表示，他不会在2024年大选中支持他的前老板唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Vice Pres. Mike Pence said he will not be endorsing his former boss Donald Trump in the 2024 general election.https://t.co/JbTiuO5vM5 pic.twitter.com/Cpgxk4qIAN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前副总统迈克-彭斯（Mike Pence）表示，他 "无法凭良心 "在2024年大选中为他的前老板唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）背书。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Vice Pres. Mike Pence said he "cannot in good conscience" endorse his former boss Donald Trump in the 2024 general election. https://t.co/rYYTvr17a4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当局宣布，一名 5 岁男童于 2022 年在印第安纳州被发现死在一个手提箱中，其母亲因与该男童的死亡有关在加利福尼亚州被拘押。
item.description:
The mother of a 5-year-old boy found dead in a suitcase in Indiana in 2022 has been taken into custody in California in connection with his death, authorities announced. https://t.co/3lGyDzfCNc pic.twitter.com/UwBS31nKtB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 爆料：由于辩方提出的证据开示问题，负责审理前总统特朗普纽约封口费案的法官已将开庭日期从原定的 3 月 25 日推迟。
item.description:
BREAKING: The judge overseeing former Pres. Trump's New York hush money case has delayed the start of the trial from its original March 25 start date, due to discovery issues raised by the defense.https://t.co/Vv2ieWPEeE pic.twitter.com/oZ8jSbWnsu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在迈克尔-瓦特利（Michael Whatley）和拉拉-特朗普（Lara Trump）控制共和党全国委员会的一周内，"选举诚信 "成为新的焦点。
item.description:
In the week since Michael Whatley and Lara Trump took control of the Republican National Committee, a new focus on "election integrity" has emerged. https://t.co/RX17XYzgP8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 以色列国防军否认了其部队周四向一群等待援助的加沙平民开火的指控。
item.description:
The IDF denied accusations that its troops opened fire on a group of Gazan civilians who were waiting for aid Thursday. https://t.co/Y5Bhqas7im

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 爆料：由于辩方提出的证据开示问题，负责审理前总统特朗普纽约封口费案的法官已将开庭日期从原定的 3 月 25 日推迟。

item.title: 在连续 27 次抽奖无一中奖之后，周五晚的百万大奖抽奖将产生超过 8 亿美元的奖金。美国东部时间晚上 11 点开奖：
item.description:
More than $800 million is on the line in Friday night's Mega Millions jackpot drawing after 27 consecutive drawings without a winner.

The prize grew $23 million on Friday due to strong ticket sales. The drawing occurs at 11 p.m. ET.

Read more: https://t.co/vrNOVF0v9p pic.twitter.com/s7BxypT919

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当局宣布，印第安纳州一名 5 岁男童被发现死在一个手提箱中，其母亲因与男童的死亡有关在加利福尼亚州被拘留。
item.description:
The mother of a 5-year-old boy found dead in a suitcase in Indiana has been taken into custody in California in connection with his death, authorities announced. https://t.co/rAR1GlogoU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当局称，周五，一名新墨西哥州警察在高速公路上执行公务时被枪杀。一名枪击案嫌犯仍在逃，可能已登上一列开往德克萨斯州的火车逃离现场。
item.description:
A New Mexico State Police officer was shot and killed in the line of duty on a highway Friday, authorities said.

A suspect in the shooting remains at-large and may have fled the scene by boarding a train heading to Texas. https://t.co/aIrOH2Aqnd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024
